name: DELVER\u2019S DROP
blurb: Play as scoundrels attempting to escape ever-shifting dungeons in a stylish physics-based Action RPG: PC Mac Linux iOS Android OUYA

rewards.reward: BACKER TIER \u25cf "Backer" credit on the game's website.

PRE-ORDER TIER \u25cf Get the game on release! \u25cf Digital copy of Delver's Drop for PC & Mac \u25cf "Kickstarter Supporter" credit in the game and website \u25cf Exclusive In-Game "Kickstarter Items" (Pack 1) \u25cf Digital Game Soundtrack \u25cf Digital Concept Art Pack \u25cf (all previous rewards)

EARLY ACCESS TIER \u25cf Closed Beta Access \u2013 includes access to the game and forums before final release \u25cf Digital Art Book + Guide \u25cf Vote on 2 additional character classes to appear in game \u25cf In-Game Items (Pack 2) \u25cf (all previous rewards)

EXTRA COPY TIER \u25cf Get a SECOND copy of the game! \u25cf 2 digital downloads for PC, Mac, & Linux \u25cf 2 key codes for iOS, Android, & Ouya \u25cf 2 key codes for one (or more) digital distribution service if/when our game is available on the service ($15 & $25 get only 1 key) \u25cf Includes all digital goods in the $25 tier & below. From the $25 Tier: ONE key for the Closed Alpha & Beta, and TWO Open Beta keys (desktop versions only) \u25cf BONUS: Contribute a Character Name \u2013 it will be used randomly in game when a new character is spawned. \u25cf This tier is included in ALL higher tiers ($40, $50, $60, etc), so they all get a 2nd bonus copy!

ANCIENT WRITINGS TIER \u25cf Postcard from the team \u25cf Contribute a Character Name \u2013 it will be used randomly in game when a new character is spawned \u25cf Digital "Secret Scroll" History Booklet \u25cf In-Game Items (Pack 3) \u25cf (all previous rewards)

NEW ALL-DIGITAL DELUXE TIER \u25cf This specially requested tier includes all digital items up to the $100 tier, but no physical items! \u25cf Exclusive In-Game Playable Character Class (from $60 tier)  \u25cf ALL In-Game Item Packs 1-6 (from ALL tiers, $15-100) \u25cf ALL items from the $15 and $25 tiers \u25cf Digital items from $40 tier: Secret Scroll, and contribute a class name \u25cf DOES NOT INCLUDE PREVIOUS REWARDS if not specified, and is EXCLUDED in other tiers ($60/$80 tiers) when they mention "all previous rewards".

LOOT DROP TIER \u25cf Exclusive In-Game Playable Character Class. ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH KICKSTARTER! \u25cf Art Print (8x11") \u25cf 1" Button Pins (set of 4) \u25cf In-Game Items (Pack 4) \u25cf (all previous rewards)
ARMORER'S TIER \u25cf Delver's Drop T-shirt (unisex & girls' tees, XS-3XL) \u25cf Sticker Set \u25cf In-Game Items (Pack 5) \u25cf (all previous rewards)

COLLECTIBLE DISC TIER \u25cf Delivered in time for holiday gifts! \u25cf Physical Game DVD + Soundtrack in printed bi-fold case \u25cf In-Game Items (Pack 6): Glimmering Weapons \u25cf (all previous rewards)
ARTISAN'S TOME TIER \u25cf Softbound Artbook + Guide \u25cf Original pencil sketch, signed (3x3")  \u25cf (all previous rewards)
HERALD'S BANNER TIER \u25cf Signed Poster (18x24") \u25cf Create a name for an item / power-up, and we will add it to the game \u25cf (all previous rewards)
NOSTALGIC ERA TIER \u25cf Sculpted 3" Clay Rogue Figurine by Leah Williams (maker of Little Lazies) \u25cf Cloth Map of the game world \u25cf (all previous rewards)

TREASURE VAULT TIER \u25cf Premium Hand-Crafted Box, Limited Edition, signed & numbered, designed to hold the disc/case & several other previous rewards \u25cf Signed original painting in ink (4x6") \u25cf Your likeness appears in-game as an NPC \u25cf (all previous rewards)

PROMOTER TIER \u25cf Exclusive Retro Woodcut poster, Limited Edition, signed & numbered, ~10x16" \u25cf "VIP Kickstarter Promotor" Credit \u25cf You design and name an in-game enemy, and we will develop it \u25cf Pixelscopic branded 1.5" square pin \u25cf (all previous rewards)
ENTHUSIAST TIER \u25cf Pixelscopic T-shirt \u25cf Hand-Sewn 12" Rogue Plushie \u25cf (all previous rewards)

ELITE ACOLYTE TIER \u25cf A personalized 2-hour art tutorial, via video chat & screen sharing \u25cf Choose an unlockable character class from several new choices. For each backer, this ADDS a character class to the base game! \u25cf Pixelscopic Hoodie \u25cf (all previous rewards)

GUILDMASTER TIER \u25cf Original artwork in ink and watercolor, signed, in a custom hand-made frame (9x12") \u25cf Visit us at Penny Arcade Expo (Prime 2013 or East 2014). We will provide an expo badge, buy you dinner and drinks, hang out, and talk about the game. Does not cover transportation / lodging. \u25cf Exclusive in-game item "Icarian Wings" \u25cf (all previous rewards)
